title: What Ty Haney of Outdoor Voices Can’t Live Without
text:
Outdoor Voices The Exercise Dress

We first launched the Exercise Dress last May — then we made improvements in the fall, and included a shorts liner with a phone pocket. This was actually the first style I ever sketched when I decided to start OV. I wanted to create a strong feminine style you could do anything in and provide an alternative to leggings. Now it’s our top-selling and most requested item. I have it every color but lately have been wearing the Scarlet Red and Black the most. It’s a good sign when a majority of the women in the office come to work in one of the new styles. You can bet you’ll see at least ten a day at HQ.
description: Outdoor Voices CEO and founder Ty Haney on her favorite things, including Retrosuperfuture Issimo sunglasses, Yeti Rambler, Dr Haushka Bronzing Tint, Maison Louise Marie candle, Anker Powercore Battery Pack.
